modName: Way of the Spellblade - More Diverse Enchanting Options
summary: This mod is obsolete. New Version/Remake: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25802/
descriptionHtml:
Way of the Spellblade (More Diverse Enchanting Options)

10/21:
...is obsolete! I\'ve re-released this mod and cleaned it up by a large margin. It can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25802/

The new mod has everything this one had along with many fixes and new content.

If the interest is shown for the \'easy\' version to be put out again, I will do just that.
author: Shinokage

files.name: Way of the Spellblade - Scimitar Fix
files.fileName: Way of the Spellblade - Scimitar Fix-23667-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml: Fixed Katariah\'s Scimitar from 65% chance to 15% chance.

files.name: Version 2
files.changelogHtml:
Redesigned Dungeon
Adjusted Bosses to have more health
Boss version of weapon has unlimited charges, will not show up in loot but standard boss version with limited charges still does.
Gave bosses custom stats and AI
Changed amount of loot Greed carries on him
Modified legendary sin based enchantments
Added two new enchantments on weapons as reward for beating Pride
Remade entrance and placed it above ground
Added notes to bosses that explain the player version of the enchantments
Added (locked) loot chests to each room which have standard boss loot
Greed dual-wields (still only drops one weapon)
Improved NavMesh of dungeon
Added wind element, does armor and resistance ignoring damage over time.
